other_tests.findings: The gallbladder is distended and filled with sludge. There is mild gallbladder wall edema measuring up to 6 mm. There is no pericholecystic fluid.

The hepatic parenchyma appears within normal limits. A hyperechoic lesion measuring approximately 6 mm in segment V of the liver, unchanged since prior study and likely represents a hemangioma. There is no intrahepatic biliary dilation. The CBD measures 6 mm.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The hyperechoic lesion in the liver is unchanged since the prior study.
